priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Irradiation Field Orientation/Sequence Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C163029

self.title: CDISC SEND Irradiation Field Orientation/Sequence Response Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the description of the irradiation field as it pertains to orientation to the body and, when appropriate, the sequencing of exposure(s).
name: Irradiation Field Orientation/Sequence Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Irradiation Field Orientation/Sequence Response Terminology

terms.definition: An irradiation modality in which radiation is applied first in an anteroposterior anatomical plane and then in a posteroanterior anatomical plane.
An irradiation modality in which radiation is applied simultaneously in the anteroposterior anatomical plane and in the posteroanterior anatomical plane.
An irradiation modality in which radiation is applied to each side of the body or body part in a sequential manner.
An irradiation modality in which radiation is applied to both sides of the body or body part at the same time.
